dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Is chatting politely in a circle all we're doing here? It's a gathering of Syndicates, dammit... When's the showdown anyway?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Sun's up, time to get off your arses. Think I'll go on a patrol to see if there's anyone stupid enough to loiter around 'our' businesses. Might as well collect some protection money, too.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
Oi, you there. Yeah, you. You've got to be one mad or stupid lad to saunter into our area in the middle of the—
Oh, hang on a minute. Were you eyin' my tats? Well, why didn't you say so from the beginning? Fine, take a gander. Just a little bit, though. Now fuck off kindly.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
Haah... of course I know how you feel, lads. There ain't nothing wrong with goin' for a few bevvies after work, yeah?
But once you do, you better go straight to bed. If any of you lads make a mistake while sloshed, I'll crack your skull open before the Captain even hears of it.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Didya hear? Apparently three of the Ten Blades of the East'll be showin' up to the meeting.
Tsk, our Patriarch would've been one of 'em too if those Thumb fuckers hadn't cut off his wrist.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Why do I keep one hand in a pocket? Oi, haven't you heard the old Syndicate wisdom? Always keep a trick up your britches, yeah?
Wha? It's sleeve, not britches? ... Well, it's all the same to me, ya little nit-pickin' bag of shite.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
That one there's the Teppu Family, the Nekomata Mafia... and... oi, those blokes over there are from the Kyokushin Clan. Huh? How do I know all their names?
'Course I do! Our Captain, that lass, she's been lecturin' me all about them sods since forever.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Oi, have a gander at my enhancement tattoos. I just got these thanks to the Captain. Look at the cloud patterns here... and it's bloody good to boot.
A strike that would've cut off my arm leaves only a little cut now, ain't that neat?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Wha...? Some small fries challenged the Captain to a duel? Hah, those sods must've underestimated Ishmael 'coz she's a new Captain...
Well, there ain't nothing for us to worry about. We just need to get ready to clean up some dead bodies.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Yaaaaawn... Whassit? Wake me up only when something serious happens, yeah?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Hooah...! Anyone else lookin' for a thrashing?

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: About time!

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Let's see their stupid mugs, whichever Syndicate they're from.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Phoo... let me catch my breath.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Kill 'em all!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: This'll hurt like hell.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Agh.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Next! Chop-chop!

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: I've cut though enough of 'em... I'll leave the rest to you...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: See? I ain't a Wakashu for nothing.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ... I told you, I'm a bit inexperienced in things other than slicing and dicing.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Oi, oi. That's enough. Finger bow-bell's comin' up—let's not make things too awkward for the big boys when they meet.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Good work, lads. I'll deal with the Captain, so let's all go for a dip at the bathhouse once we're done with the cleanup.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Blimey, this is some embarrassin' shite... Oi, I ain't going back until we deal with this mess. Tell the Captain... that I'll be back before our next meeting.
